Reviews.Title: Cool / Expensive
Reviews.Author: R. Guzman "Technology Director"
Reviews.Content: Prompt delivery, so props to seller for that.This screen works as advertised and it's a fair companion to Fuji's 3D camera. If the price was half as much, I'd say it's a great companion to the camera. Interestingly, the resolution and lenticular effect is NOT as impressive as the camera's 3D screen. The camera's 3D screen seems to have more pixels per inch, and the lenticular prisms appear to be more tightly packed than on this standalone viewer.That being said, glasses-free 3D at an 800x600 resolution is nothing to sniff at. 3D pictures look good on this screen when viewed between 2-3 feet, and at the correct angle. Leaving it on all the time in 3D mode doesn't quite make sense, since you can't really glance at the screen to enjoy a 3D image from any odd angle. It almost makes more sense to leave it in 2D mode and switch to 3D when you feel like picking it up and holding it in the correct position.All limitations accounted for, I'm still glad I bought this. (But I'm a nerd who places outsized value on new tech.) One BIG unexpected surprise is that this thing has a full-size HDMI input on it, and it can display 3D games and blu-ray from my PS3!! I just played some Uncharted 3 and lost an hour in the blink of an eye. It's completely playable as long as you perch this screen at eye level. If the PS3 was only smaller, this would make a killer portable gaming setup.If you have the cash to spare and you're the right kind of enthusiast, this is a fun piece of kit.

Reviews.Title: Very good 3D viewer, ASUKA in Japan shipped immediately!
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I own the Fuji W3 3D camera and the 3D screen on the back of the camera is great, but too small for a true display.  This viewer (V3) is larger and is also 3D without glasses.  The result is quite good and the pictures are sharp.  it can play video in 3D with sound, too.  It is expensive, but the shipper (ASUKA) in Japan was quick--it arrived in within a week, was well packed, and they included a pair of Japanese chop sticks!

Reviews.Title: Fuji Finepix Real 3d V3 Viewer for 3d W3
Reviews.Author: Smedes
Reviews.Content: Positive: Colorfull, bright, good contrast, no shadowing, perfect 3d effect, easy to use.Negative: Connection to AC/DC necessary, only one viewer can see the 3d effect perfectly because you have to align exactly with the screen, expensive,

Reviews.Title: Incredible 3D viewer!
Reviews.Author: jmh
Reviews.Content: Great resolution - almost as good as the 3D camera's screen. I honestly couldn't tell the difference. I highly recommend this to view your 3D photos so you and your friends don't have to squint to see the 3D images. Great quality.

Reviews.Title: Great 3D photo frame
Reviews.Author: Mostafa Sallam
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried buying this especially that all other 3D photo frames are low-rated ones..This one is great, its resolution is great & gives u the 3D view just like the one in the camera but with a bigger size..The shipper is very quick & they sent it internationally next day & it arrived within 5 days from Japan !!It's a bit slow responding but compared to the other pros this is nothing... If only they can release a version that works with batteries so that you can watch the photos anywhere ...

Reviews.Title: maybe as a toy if it was almost cheap as non3d frames
Reviews.Author: KeithK
Reviews.Content: As an avid 3d shooter with dozens of 3d cameras and thousands of photos taken.....opinion is this is a nice toy but kind of useless unless you have time to make adjustments to every photo and then view from a very specific spot.

Reviews.Title: Amazing (and better than V1) !
Reviews.Author: Dixours
Reviews.Content: I own the Fuji W3 3D camera and the Fuji  Real 3D V1 Viewer. The 3D screen resolution of Real 3D V1 is really poor. So, I decided to buy the Fuji Real 3D V3 Viewer and it's great ! It can read 3D videos and it's a lenticular technology. But, 7.2 inch... I would like a little bit larger.Sorry about my poor english : I'm french.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: J. J Shea
Reviews.Content: Works well it came from Japan in 5 days instructions in Japanese only had to call Fuji they sent me a downloaded version tFor $10.00 every one is amazed at 3d effect I am surprised it is not more popular

Reviews.Title: No user manual in English
Reviews.Author: Yechiel Caesari
Reviews.Content: I got the product as expected, but it didn't include a user manual in English.The user manual in the box was only in Chinese, Japanese and other Asian languages.The only text in English was on the box saying "Not to be sold outside of Japan".So basically I have the product but I don't know how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: i hope it's better tha the v1
Reviews.Author: wolf "wolf"
Reviews.Content: I don't have one. I'm shying away because of my experiences with their V1.i see they are still limiting the 3d video to one singular format, so I'm not holding my breath. I had a horrible experience with mine, and the customer service was no better than the product.the V1 was pure crap. I wound up using it as a regular digital foto frame that I could have gotten from the drugstore for $20.
